thread.title: Rep. Chris Collins: We'll Explain Our Health Care Bill 'Once We Get It Done' (VIDEO)
thread.title_full: Rep. Chris Collins: We'll Explain Our Health Care Bill 'Once We Get It Done' (VIDEO)

author: Matt Shuham
title: Rep. Chris Collins: We'll Explain Our Health Care Bill 'Once We Get It Done' (VIDEO)
text:
A close congressional ally of President Donald Trump said Wednesday that he would have an opportunity to explain to his constituents exactly what was in the GOP bill to repeal Obamacare once it'd already passed the House.
Read More â†’
